text: Mbe ne nzuaim, Zisas mben nzarigi, “Ee, nde Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar kha kameŋ gangi fhuve? Mba kameŋ khaŋ nzuai, ‘Mba pheni ga mbui gumgi, mbe mba kɨma garim, ana mbatɨgim, mbe ana fekhɨngi. Mba kɨm, ana ntigem mba phena bɨna suirigim, ana havhargiap thɨgi. Fhe Bakɨme, ana nduara mba bigeŋ ga muuŋgim, ne hɨgim, nza ne garim, ne guigira vhergi.’
